missionstate.description: Help Jack Simps in him experience, get 25 apples bites and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help John Rouver to complete his collection, get 10 bat wings and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help Mary Vinn to complete her collection of pokemon teeth, get 15 teeth and report back to her.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Complete Rock Jhonson mission, get 10 razor fangs and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help Mary Nady to win her science fair, get 50 water gems, 50 bottles of poison and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Do what Joe Tiff asked, get 13 pot of moss mug and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Do what Bob Lop asked, get 10 crab claws and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help the professor oak in his search, dex 30 Pokemon and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help Eric Garinson to sit well with his family, get a pidgey and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help the professor oak in his search, dex 50 Pokemon and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help the professor oak in his search, dex 100 Pokemon and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help the professor oak in his search, dex 145 Pokemon and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help the professor oak in his search, dex 151 Pokemon and report back to him.
Congratulations! You helped a citzen of pokemon world and got your reward.
Help Zazi to find his fishing rod. Collect: 20 balls of wool, 10 stone orbs, 10 shell bells and 6 rubys.
Take Zazi the items he needs to build a new fishing rod. Collect: 500 water gems, 200 metal spikes, 50 ball of wools, 100 screws, 50 electrizers, 20 tangela hairs and a splash plate.
Find and bring back the notes of Professor Mark! He lost in the Pokemon Mansion on Cinnabar.
Find Chanseys that are disappearing, probably this is the stuff of Team Rocket. There are rumors that one of the bases of Team Rocket is on Celadon.
Take your tools to begin your work. You will need: a Pick, a Flashlgiht and a Rope. The Pick you can buy from a blacksmith who lives in Mt Moon.

Go to Mt Moon and look for the entry of the old mines, there go north until you find Earth Piles. Then use your Pick on the Earth Piles until you get 10 Iron Ores. Return with the Pick and 10 Iron Ores.
Trawl through the old mine at Mt Moon and look for maps that are out there.
Look for a hole in the mines of Mt Moon, there you will find a door and some paths. You should explore the area and find the Moon Stone fragment!
Bring these items to Gary's Assistant: 50x Water Gem, 50x Bottle of Poison, 7x Bitten Apple, 7x Tooth and 5x Bat Wing.
Bring these items to Gary's Assistant: 12x Bulb, 200x Fire Element, 10x Pot of Lava, 15x Hull, 20x Electrizer and 200x Screw.
Bring these items to Gary's Assistant: 25x Leaf, 10x Bulb, 20x Hull, 25x Pot of Lava, 10x Flame Orb, 35x Pot of Moss Mug, 15x Gracidea, 15x Revival Herb, 28x Water Pendant, 18x Stone Orb...
... 50x Feather, 40x Fur, 10x Tangela Hair, 30x Black Sludge, 400x Bottle of Poison, 10x Slowpoke Tail, 15x Metal Spikes and 30x Electrizer.
Bring these items to Gary's Assistant: 20x Gyarados Tail, 10x Yellow Tail, 1x Scyther Razor, 5x Jynx Clothes, 20x Magma Stone, 20x Ruby, 30x Twisted Spoon, 20x Reaper Cloth, 200x Water Gem...
... 200x Fire Element, 200x Screw, 200x Seed, 50x Leaves, 30x Stone Orb, 30x Flame Orb and 30x Razor Fang.
Maurice is producing TV cameras, take it to the following items: 200x Screws, 30x Electrizers and 30x Metal Spikes.
My brother is in a dig at Mt Moon, go there find him, deliver this letter and ask about the fossils.
At the end of this cave there is a special rock, try to do some digging in it with this shovel. Good luck, be careful there!
Collect: 200x Fancy Fabrics, 200x Long Silks and 5000 dollars.
Collect: 50x Fire Orbs, 50x White Orbs and 50x Black Diamonds.
Collect: 1500x Light Feathers and 100x Big Feathers.
Collect: 500x Downy Feather and 50x Resistant Fabric.
Collect: 50x Spool of Yarn and 500x Bamboo Leaves.
Collect: 100x Insect Skins and 150x Hard Nails.
Collect: 1000x Lightweight Fabrics and 100x Exquisite Silks.
Collect: 50x Healing Oil and 50x Old Bandage.
Help Misty find her Pokemon egg that was stolen by Team Rocket. The clues indicate that they fled to the north of Cerulean.
Find Dr. Oravaf and help him to fix the Pokedex Upgrader.
Go to Power Plant and look for a Codex Motor, an Energy Transformer and a Bignose Gear. They can be found on the old machines.
Investigate about the Orange Archipelago and return to Professor Oak.
Find Runford and asks for the Orange Archipelago map.
Find Pistachio and bring the Orange Archipelago map.
Bring 1x Burning Heart and 1x Frozen Heart.
Bring 1x Blastoise Hull and 1x Colourful Feather.
Bring 1x Petrified Scream and 1x Black Diamond.
Bring 1x Pincer Horn and 1x Scyther Razor.
Bring 1x Box Gloves and 1x Yellow Tail.
Find Professor Ivy and take the GS ball to Professor Oak.
Find Bill in Kanto and take the necessary tools to catch the Thief Aipom and recover the GS ball.
Investigate Tangelo Island and look for some Tangel Rue leaves.
Take the Tangel Rue leaves to ECP in Mandarin Island and bring the extraction to Professor Ivy.
Deliver to Albert an empty flask to achieve the plant extraction.
Use the cookies on these young Pokemon: Paras, Butterfree, Vileplume, Raticate, Spinarak and Bellossom.
Talk with Sir John and ask him to fix the roof.
Bring Sir John: 20x Piece of Royal Steel, 10x Ruby, 10x Cure Herb and 10x Pot of Water.
Bring Sir John a Toolbox. You can buy one at Pummelo Island.
Bring to Merv Kelley the Secret Recipe. It is hidden inside the Kanto Safari Zone.
Bring to Merv Kelley a Lichi Fruit. Located with the Wayne family on Ascorbi Island.
Bring to Merv Kelley an Orenji Fruit. Located center of the Mikan Island.
Bring to Merv Kelley a Wampi Fruit. Unkonwn location.
Find the key and turn on the machine on Kimberly Downson house.
Bring to Gord Scottie 20x Grape Fruit.
Bring to Queenie Jerrie 20x Grape Flower.
Bring to Curtis Sacheverell 10x Grape Fruit.
Bring to Gord Scottie the letter from Curtis Sacheverell.
Bring to Tereza Mendes a Lipstick.
Find the hidden Pepper Denis friends. You must say 'hidden' when you're near them.
Defeat the Spinaraks near Tilly Dianna house.
Find the thief Rocket and bring back to Jewel Annice her Pokemon.
Bring to Saruman the lost Donphan Ball.
Bring to Gollum 15x Red Apples, 15x Oranges, 15x Blueberrys, 15x Melon, 15x Pears and 15x Strawberry.
Bring to Slash 300x Screws and 50x Electrizers.
Bring to Ernest Upper his lost Totodile.
Plant 5 seeds on Farmer Steve field.
Use the Shovel to find Flavia necklace.
Bring to Raymund Headley 30x Bitten Apple, 25x Sandbag, 40x Fur, 30x Gracidea and 10x Horn.
Bring to Paulina Megan 50x Empty Poke Ball and 50x Empty Ultra Ball.
Bring to Hettie Sibyl 1x Shiny Stone Orb, 1x Shiny Feather, 1x Shiny Bulb and 1x Shiny Pot of Lava.
Bring to Harmonie Rainbow a Lemonade.
Bring to Flossie Cherise 1x Butterfree doll, 1x Alakazam doll, 1x Charizard doll, 1x Pikachu doll, 1x Koffing doll, 1x Diglett doll and 1x Kingdra doll.
Bring to Flossie Cherise 100x Fire Element, 100x Water Gem, 100x Seed, 100x Leaves, 100x Screw e 50x Energy Soil.
Bring to Flossie Cherise 10x Churros With Chocolate, 15x Burger, 20x Sushi, 10x Pizza and 15x Lemonade.
Deliver Kurt Fastman McGaryson newspapers to his customers. The customers names can be found within the list that he gives.
Deliver Kurt Fastman McGaryson newspapers to his special customer named Bud Jude. He can be found at Butwal Island
Investigate about the Crystal Onix. If you find him, take a picture with Mateo camera.
Go inside Jarrod laboratory and test his new Poke Ball.
Bring to Jarrod: 10x Electrizer, 5x Metal Spike, 50x Gear Wheel and 10x Magnet.
Find Woodworker Courts Ted and ask him for make the new fence.
Bring to Max Fegan the second boards delivery.
Bring to Max Fegan the third boards delivery.
Cut some trees arround Courts Ted house and bring him some wood.
Deliver the message from Courts Ted to his wife named Beatriz, she live on Celadon.
Feed Courts Ted Machop, he lives underground the island.
Protect Courts Ted Machop from the aggressive Pokemon.
Find the Thief Pokemon and bring to Oliver Terrel his backpack.
Look for the special item of Oliver, there are indications that it may be lost within the mountain.
Go through the challenge with two players and find the baby ticket.
Follow the Adventurer Lucy clues and find the mysterious prophecy in the Golden or Butwal Island.
Help the three tribes to regain the balance that is breaking. The first step is grab the Pokemon Translator and then find the Sea Tribe.
Talk to the chief of the tribe of the mountains and the chief of the tribe of the sky to find the two Restores Stones and bring them to Chief Vaporeon.
Release your Pokemon and then use the Pokedex that is in your inventory on the Pokemon.
Go to the PokeMart and ask for Ray Fitz order.
Go to the sewers and defeat 1x Rattata.
Go to the sewers, defeat and catch 1x Rattata.
Use your Pokedex on 3 different Pokemon.
Get next a river or lake and fish until you reach fishing skill 5.
Go to the PokeMart and type 'trade' then locate and buy 1x Pokemon Revive. You may defeat some Pokemon and grab the items that they drop to sell at the PokeMart and then buy the Pokemon Revive!
Go talk to your professor, he is already aware of the situation. At the end go back to my presence. Good luck!
This stone is being kept on the Shamouti island. Run to the bottom of the main island and find the way. Go!
You have to go through a new trial. Decipher our little secret and go where no one dared to come.
My Ash need this honey pot to save sick Pokemon, please take it up. You will find him next to the boat S.S. Anne in Vermilion.

Go to east of Fuchsia at route 15, on top of a mountain you will find a special tree. Use this honey on the tree and take good care, a hungry Beedrill will go behind you. Defeat this Beedrill and bring a special mushroom for us.
Now I'm a little hungry, bring me a burger I'll tell you something.
Bring me 50 stone orbs and 4 fist plates.
Ok, I have an old friend who does not see time, I want you to find it for me. You will be able to find it on the Ice Island. Bring something in there to prove that you were.
Beat the three Lee brothers, You'll find them on the Wind Island, north of the Ice Island.
Go to the south of this mountain, there is a secret passage to the Natural Mountain. Go there and bring to me a special stone, called Ancient Rune.
Find the Easter Rabbit and help him get back his other part.
There remain some shadows of that creature yet! Please check back to that cave and defeat them.
You must bring me 200 fur's, 30 ape hair's, 5 gyarados tail's and 30 shell bell's.
Get the black oil for Alex. You can find the entrance to the south, remember to use your dive equipment and the empty bottle. Good luck!
You will need to look into the depths of the ocean! Look for the old black shell, there you will find my pearl.
You must bring me 200 fur's, 30 jynx clothes, 40 frozen heart's and 60 shard's.

For the second part, you need to bring me a piece of special cloth. There are many of them in my house, I can take you there, but you have to be careful when handling them because they are very fragile and tear easily.
There is a very rare stone called the ice yolk stone, she is at the end of a large cave and guarded by powerful ice pokemon. If you bring it to me so I will give you the ski clothing.
There is a passage over that tile. Go there and follow the instructions of the dungeon. I'll be here waiting for your news.
Extract the Old Amber DNA with the resynthesizer.
Defeat these evil creatures and bring me the seven relics. You will find the creatures at the invasions that he send to the towns.
Purify the evil creatures soul. But please, do very carefully, they have no guilt!
I'm sure there's someone who can help us in Pallet. A girl, yes! I do not remember his name... ask for {Pokemon stress}. Take a look on Pallet and return with good news!
I was going to see my brother Gary, he called me with a look of concern. You can check it for me while I go to the lab? Please back here after talking with him. He is at Viridian City.
Take this magnifier, you may need. Use the magnifier in suspicious places. Report to me when you find something.
Take this knife. Use it in the plant and return with a piece for me.
Go with this magnifier. See what you can do. I will mark on your map the location where you must begin the search, use the magnifier at all.
Go to Pallet Town and talk to Delia, Ash's mom. Tell her we're making progress. When I you need I call.
I received a letter from him days ago. I put it in my trunk upstairs.
Meanwhile, go to Cerulean and warn the authorities about this case. When you do this, return.
Take these 8 posters. I'll mark on your map the locations that need to glue them. Will be 4 in each city.
My device sends some signals from Vermilion. Go investigate.

quest.name: Kanto Main #04 - S. S. Anne and Rockets!

missionstate.description: Go and prove your worth against my sailors. Defeat them all and then you will have your place in our ship!
They fled with the ship ignition key, talk to First Mate and to see where they go! Please go fast!
Take this broom and help us clean up this mess. Use it to clean the floor of this room. Clean 7 places and return.
You must find a Blue Flute to wake the Pokemon.
Take a look around to see from where comes this smell of poop!
Look for a mushroom around Mt. Moon. It is blue in color. Use a Pokemon to cut it. Bring to me and we can heal Weezing.
Take it to the Weezing. Once it heals, take him by the passage that I found when I went to visit him.
In this paper I gave you are the name of three persons here in Fuchsia who asked me for help. Complete these three tasks and then talk to me.
I need you to plant these berries for me. They are eight. Go to the ground outside my house and use the tools there.
Light all the torches down there with some of your Fire Pokemon and I will be very grateful.
I have some wardrobes in my house that are old and I need to destroy them. Can you help me?
They all lost their special ribbons, this can only be a curse! Use every trick you know to try to find them, please. They are five.
All you need to do is return him to his PokeBall. We'll have to put him to sleep. Try this device that I recently created.
My brother Forrest is in our house in need of a help.
First helps Salvadore. He is the eldest after me... you'll know who it is.
We need to prepare 40 cooked onigiri. Now take this sauce and place on them.
Now take to the stove and serve two for each brother.
Go to the Golem and deliver this nugget that he loves. Then use this tool to polish the ends to let him faster in the battle. And lastly fill his pot of food with it.
Our toy is in the basement and we forget that our brother Brock's Zubat is sleeping right now.
The manufacturer gave me a list of materials that I needed to collect. Get them for me and you will have your reward.
Put them in this bag. Hand it to the bow manufacturer in Lavender. Once he does, return to me!
Bring the necessary items to make the Bow.
Very well. Come back in two hours and it will be ready.
You need to defeat the Electric type Pokemon to energize my battery, use the battery on them after defeat.
I developed a machine to extract the juice here in the gym. I need you to do 5 juices for me. It is the combination of five berries: Sitrus, Pecha, Leppa, Oran and Chesto.
The plants are on Route 13, all you need to do is use a Pokemon with CUT ability to collect them. Be careful because they are poisonous. I need 30 Blue Pollens. When finished, bring them to me.
First 'Use' the Reward Chest right there to receive a Pikachu. Once you perform the action, get back here.
Place the Poke Ball at the Ball Slot and 'Use' the Ball Slot to call your Pokemon out.
Use the Order icon to move your Pokemon over the map.
Won me in a Pokemon battle. Remember, just say 'battle'.
Go through that door and catch one Magikarp. 'Use' the empty Poke Ball in your Backpack over the body lying on the floor.
There is a 'DIFFERENT' way to catch Pokemon.
Take your Pokedex and use it on the Psyduck. Just 'Use' the Pokedex and then select the Pokemon. See the details and come back to talk to me.
I will tell you how 'HM' works.
I made an order with the Pallet PokeMart. Please take it for me, his name is Patton.
Use the Caterpie Headbutt until reach Headbutting skill five (5).
Use the Seal at the Poke Ball and release the Pokemon.

You will be mesmerized by my Pokemon and you will be taken to the world of dreams. We will be connected to the Dream World, a world of Pokemon dreams. And there I created a challenge for trainers. Unravel the mystery and you will can.
Find and help Mr. Fuji at Lavender Tower.
Rescue Mr. Fuji Pokemon: Fuji's Eevee, Fuji's Cubone, Fuji's Lickitung, Fuji's Totodile and Fuji's Pupitar.
Go to Celadon, maybe we can help there. Contact with the owner of the hotel there, Briscoe Len.
Meet Briscoe Len at his room downstairs.
Investigate Silph Co and look for Ash Ketchum.

quest.name: Kanto Main #09 - Who is the masked?

missionstate.description: Find and find out who is the Mystery Guy.
Find the secret entrance for the laboratory on Cinnabar and collect information.
Enter in Queter Phill portal and collect the essence of Suramoon.
Find Grinch hideout. The sewers are a nice place to start out.
Go back to the place and use this machine that shows whether there is a false wall nearby, I will inform my superiors, we met there.
Please try to find some way to get me out, but beware, here is full of traps, the suspect is very cunning, stay tuned.
Bring me 5 lemons and 5 sample of sand wasp honey.
Bring me 5 balls of wool and 2 spider silks.
Bring to grinch Martha May's presents.
Help Rundolph to deliver the presents around Kanto cities.
Go to the Team Rocket base, destroy the doors and look for more clues.
Go back to the Team Rocket base and save Mistery Guy.
Bill is analyzing the HD, come back after 1 hour.
Go to Silph Co. and ask Charley Aden about the Master Ball.
Charley is creating a Master Ball prototype, come back after 1 hour.
Go to the island that Dr. Fuji spoke, find the laboratory and look for Mewtwo clues.
Go to Vermilion and get the boat to the New Island.
Ask the mission to Peter Paul and then do all the initial missions of the 4 factions.
Find out who the traitor is in the alliance and its motives.
Find out who the traitor is and confront him.

By defeating the traitor, you will have the confidence of all factions, but you must choose which one you will represent. This choice will give you a benefit in the future, which varies from faction to faction.
Get a new Telescope for Sotashi.
Prove to Nagumo that you are trusted by Calico and you will be trusted for it.
Take the radio to Ed Blackhood, keeping in touch with the factions.
Give Nagumo a suspicious paper of Calico.
Give the drawings to Blackhood, he knows something.
Barba Roja wants to pay you within rum.
Barba Roja searches for his treasure.
Cover the bank debt with Javy Dones.
Looks like Calico owes something to Javy Dones, cover it.
Activate the portals of Ed's boat.
Conquer everyone's trust in the alliance and you will have access to the portals.
Give Ed the letter with the strange drawings, he will know what it is.
Someone has manipulated the facts, who will be and what is his intention?
Swallow the pretty shell for Jack Spearow.
Give the diamond to Javy Dones.
Very cool! That's right! Look for me the following: 5x Bitten Apple and 5x Mouldy Cheese.
This time I will need the following items: 3x Tooth and 20x Bottle of Poison.
Actually they are two things, haha! 40x Water Gem and 40x Bottle of Poison.
I knew I could count on you, bring me the following: 5x Bat Wing, 5x Tooth, 10x Mouldy Cheese, and 10x Bitten Apple.
My dream is to start my journey with a Rattata, my favorite Pokemon! If you bring one for me, I will give you a very good reward.
I do not know what I do wrong, but no Pokemon wants to get into the Pokeballs I throw! Could you catch a Zubat for me?
Do you believe he never wanted to give me a Pokemon? Thanks to you I got now, but... can you bring a Poliwag for me? Thank you.
Do not tell anyone, but I need an Ekans. It will be my great triumph.
I need you to collect information from 5 Pokemon with your Pokedex!
Okay, now I need you to gather information from 10 Pokemon.
Now, I'm going to need 20 Pokemon information!
Can you bring me... 50 Pokemon information?!
Okay, I need you to defeat 10x Rattata in the city manholes.
Are those Zubats who are eating all my flowers, could you defeat 5x Zubat?
I thought it was over, but these terrible ones showed up. Please defeat 5x Weedle.
Yes, they are very dangerous. I need you to defeat 10x Ekans.
Now you have to reach fishing level 15.
Show me what you are capable of, reach 30 level of fishing!
After this last step, you are officially a professional fisherman. Reach level 50 fishing.
